p: The earliest cases of COVID-19 were reported from China in December 2019 [ 1]. WHO failed to recognize the condition that eventually grew to the pandemic scale [ 10, 23, 24]. Initial opposition to imposing travel restrictions and negating human to human transmission of SARS-CoV-2 are examples of this [ 24]. WHO declared COVID-19 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020. However, it was not before 11 March 2020, that WHO declared it a pandemic [ 2, 10, 11].
